steps.title: Discovery & Planning
steps.description: We start by understanding your business goals, target audience, and project requirements. Our team conducts thorough research and creates a detailed roadmap for your project.

steps.title: Design & Prototyping
steps.description: Our designers create intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that align with your brand identity. We develop interactive prototypes to visualize the final product before development begins.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Our expert developers build your application using the latest technologies and best practices. We follow agile methodologies to ensure transparency and flexibility throughout the development process.

steps.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
steps.description: We conduct rigorous testing to ensure your application is bug-free, secure, and performs optimally across all devices and platforms.

steps.title: Deployment & Launch
steps.description: We handle the deployment process, ensuring a smooth transition to production. Our team provides comprehensive documentation and training to help you manage your application effectively.

steps.title: Ongoing Support & Maintenance
steps.description: We offer continuous support and maintenance services to keep your application running smoothly. Our team is always available to address any issues and implement new features as your business evolves.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Find answers to common questions about our services

faqs.question: What is Next.js and why should I use it for my project?
faqs.answer: Next.js is a React framework that enables server-side rendering, static site generation, and other performance optimizations. It's ideal for building fast, SEO-friendly web applications with excellent developer experience. We recommend Next.js for projects that require optimal performance, SEO, and scalability.

faqs.question: How does Sanity CMS differ from traditional content management systems?
faqs.answer: Sanity is a headless CMS that separates content from presentation, giving you complete flexibility in how your content is displayed across different platforms. Unlike traditional CMSs, Sanity allows for structured content, real-time collaboration, and custom editing experiences. It's perfect for multi-channel publishing and complex content models.

faqs.question: What advantages does Expo offer for mobile app development?
faqs.answer: Expo is a framework and platform for universal React applications that simplifies the process of building, deploying, and iterating on iOS, Android, and web apps from the same JavaScript/TypeScript codebase. It offers faster development cycles, over-the-air updates, and access to native device features without requiring native code knowledge.

faqs.question: How long does it typically take to complete a project?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity, scope, and requirements. A simple website might take 4-6 weeks, while a complex application could take 3-6 months. During our initial consultation, we'll provide a detailed timeline based on your specific project needs.

faqs.question: Do you offer ongoing maintenance and support after launch?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer various maintenance and support packages to ensure your application continues to run smoothly after launch. These include regular updates, security patches, performance monitoring, and feature enhancements. We can tailor a support plan to meet your specific needs and budget.

faqs.question: How do you handle project communication and updates?
faqs.answer: We believe in transparent and regular communication. We use project management tools like Jira or Asana, conduct weekly progress meetings, and provide detailed reports. Our clients have direct access to the project team, including developers, designers, and project managers.
